snippet: Zynga says Electronic Arts violated antitrust laws by trying to prevent its employees from defecting to Zynga.
abstract: Video game developer Zynga files a countersuit against Electronic Arts, claiming it violated antitrust laws by trying to prevent its employees from defecting to Zynga; suit follows copyright infringement lawsuit filed by EA.
lead_paragraph: Zynga says Electronic Arts violated antitrust laws by trying to prevent its employees from defecting to Zynga.

headline.seo: Zynga Files Countersuit Against Electronic Arts
headline.main: Zynga Files Countersuit Against Electronic Arts
headline.print_headline: Zynga Files Countersuit Against Electronic Arts
